participant_1.background:
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
My family is very supportive of my writing.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.
i couldn t live without my cell phone.
my father worked 11 hours a day.

participant_2.background:
I'm a writer and artist, following in the footsteps of my parents.
i love to go hiking.
I maintained a healthy weight last year.
my best friend lives in a big city.
my favorite mortal combat character is milena.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing well too! I am a potter, and I love to hide my true self from my parents. What do you like to do?
I am a writer and artist, following in the footsteps of my parents. I also love to go hiking.
That is great! I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record. What is something you are proud of?
I maintained a healthy weight last year, and I am very proud of that.
That is awesome! I am not a very good cook, but I love to eat.
My best friend lives in a big city, and I love to visit her. I love the hustle and bustle of the city.
I have never been to a big city, but I would love to go. I am more of a country girl.
My favorite Mortal Kombat character is Milena. What is your favorite game?
I have never played Mortal Kombat, but I love to play video games. My favorite game is Mario Kart.
Mario Kart is a great game! I have also played that game before.
